english.segment1: Farewell old friends. This has been the best it could've been. Farewell old friends. And we won't forget. The times we've spent
english.segment2: As for me and my countrymen. We are headed out to sea. And there's no way that this is the end for them or for me. So farewell
english.segment3: For now, farewell. This has been a tale. We hope you'd tell. Don't forget what we've become. And the training's worht the time it took. Now that it is done
english.segment4: When the waves. They come crashing in. Well, I will stand and sing. There is nothing for us to fear. We're in the service of the good King. The good King
english.segment5: So farewell, farewell. Farewell old friends. Farewell, farewell. Farewell old friends
